benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/payments - Trigger a payment (authorization, purchase or credit)

gaps: Explicit coverage for all three payment transaction types (authorization, purchase, and credit)
recommendations: Add dedicated tests for each of the three payment transaction types (authorization, purchase, and credit) to ensure correct handling across all types
Add a dedicated test for idempotent/duplicate submissions to verify proper handling (e.g., same request submitted twice)
Add rate-limiting tests to verify behavior under high request volume and concurrent POSTs
Add caching checks where applicable (e.g., verify that POST responses are not cached, or verify ETag/Cache-Control headers for GETs)
Add tests for additional error scenarios not yet explicitly covered (e.g., 403 Forbidden, 404 Not Found for non-account resources)
